description.value:
Requirements You're wielding an area or automatic weapon.

With a mighty bellow, you unload your weapon to give your allies the cover they need to rally. You Area Fire or Auto-Fire without selecting a primary target. Give a verbal order as part of your firing, selecting either Reload, Strike, or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Take Cover]. Every ally within 30 feet who hears and understands your order can perform the action you selected as a reaction.
